Test Name: Hepatitis B Virus Surface Antigen (HBsAg) Confirmation
Purpose: To confirm the presence of Hepatitis B Virus Surface Antigen in prenatal serum specimens, providing reliable and accurate diagnostic results.
Container: Serum Separator Tube (SST) or Red-Top Tube
Equipment: ELISA reader, calibrated centrifuge, incubator (37 Â°C), micropipettes, magnetic stirrer
